name: @toast-ui/squire
description: Squire is an HTML5 rich text editor, which provides powerful cross-browser normalisation, whilst being supremely lightweight and flexible.
author: NHN. FE Development Lab

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:raw-js && npm run build:js && npm run build:html
scripts.build:raw-js: cat source/intro.js source/Constants.js source/TreeWalker.js source/Node.js source/Range.js source/KeyHandlers.js source/Clean.js source/Clipboard.js source/Editor.js source/exports.js source/outro.js | grep -v 'jshint' > build/squire-raw.js
